author: Carlos, De Miguel
title: Llega la hibridaciÃ³n suave al Cupra Formentor, que gana la etiqueta ECO
text:
Mercado
Llega la hibridaciÃ³n suave al Cupra Formentor, que gana la etiqueta ECO
Este modelo, que es superventas de la marca espaÃ±ola, espera un nuevo impulso con esta versiÃ³n MHEV de 150 caballos
No es por casualidad que el Formentor haya sido, desde el nacimiento de Cupra hace ahora seis aÃ±os, el modelo mÃ¡s vendido con diferencia de todo el catÃ¡logo. Este automÃ³vil, desarrollado y fabricado totalmente en EspaÃ±a, incrementÃ³ sus ventas el pasado aÃ±o en un 23% y mantiene una trayectoria brillante en el primer semestre de este ejercicio. Dentro de su gama de motorizaciones, ahora presenta una versiÃ³n de hibridaciÃ³n media (MHEV) con una potencia de 150 caballos que relanzarÃ¡ las ventas del Formentor al contar, entre otras caracterÃ­sticas, con las ventajas que le proporciona su etiqueta Eco.
Es un paso mÃ¡s dentro de la polÃ­tica de electrificaciÃ³n de la marca que, como se sabe, dispone de una poderosa versiÃ³n hÃ­brida enchufable (PHEV), la VZ, que proporciona una potencia de hasta 272 caballos. Los ingenieros de la casa tienen en preparaciÃ³n para sacar dentro de uso meses una versiÃ³n asimismo PHEV con una potencia de 204 caballos y que serÃ¡ econÃ³micamente mÃ¡s atractiva.
La novedad de hoy es la hibridaciÃ³n suave que se ha introducido en la motorizaciÃ³n de gasolina eTSI de 1,5 litros, que rinde una potencia de 150 caballos y que se complementa con una baterÃ­a de 48 voltios. Una soluciÃ³n mecÃ¡nica que le asegura buenas prestaciones, como lo acredita su aceleraciÃ³n de 0 a 100 en nueve segundos y una comodidad de marcha tanto por ciudad como en recorridos por carretera, donde el chasis y las suspensiones permiten una conducciÃ³n rÃ¡pida y segura., ayudados por un magnÃ­fico cambio automÃ¡tico DSG de siete velocidades. Y con un apreciable ahorro de combustible, ya que tiene homologado un consumo por debajo de los seis litros. Este Cupra Formentor mantiene la misma imagen elegante y deportiva del resto de sus hermanos de otras motorizaciones, ya que solo se distingue de las versiones mÃ¡s potentes por los escapes de la zona posterior. Se trata de un SUV de apariencia muy moderna y con unas dimensiones equilibradas, ya que mide 4,45 metros de largo por 1,83 de ancho y 1,50 de alto, con una distancia entre ejes de 2,68 metros, lo que asegura una muy buena habitabilidad interior y un maletero amplio con 450 litros de capacidad.
El interior mantiene el ambiente deportivo que acompaÃ±a a todos los Cupra, sin excepciÃ³n del modelo que elijamos. Frente al conductor aparecen dos pantallas: la que nos informa del funcionamiento mecÃ¡nico o los datos de la conducciÃ³n, que mide 10,3 pulgadas, y la que se dedica a la informaciÃ³n y el entretenimiento, algo mÃ¡s grande hasta 12,9 pulgadas, y que dispone de todas las conexiones para mÃ³viles. A sus mandos podremos elegir de manera muy simple entre tres diferentes modos de conducciÃ³n y en su equipamiento figuran todas las habituales ayudas a la conducciÃ³n (ADAS), que nos facilitan la vida, como avisos de Ã¡ngulo muerto, de cambio de carril, control de crucero, frenada de emergencia, lector de seÃ±alesâ€¦. Y todo complementado con un espectacular equipo de sonido.
Este Formentor de hibridaciÃ³n suave y etiqueta Eco darÃ¡, sin duda, un nuevo impulso a las vetas del modelo y, en opiniÃ³n de VÃ­ctor Sarasola, el director comercial de la marca en nuestro paÃ­s, atraerÃ¡ a nuevos clientes que buscan este tipo de motorizaciÃ³n. Un paso mÃ¡s en el Ã©xito de la compaÃ±Ã­a que naciÃ³ en el aÃ±o 2018 con el lanzamiento del Ateca, continuo en 2020 con la llegada de las dos carrocerÃ­as del LeÃ³n, la berlina y la sportourer, y el Formentor, que se han convertido en el icono de la compaÃ±Ã­a y fundamental para el desarrollo del negocio. Asi lo demuestran las cifras de ventas del primer semestre de este aÃ±o, espacio de tiempo en el que Cupra vendiÃ³ 6.610 unidades del Formentor, frente a las 4.900 del LeÃ³n, 350 del Born y 280 del Ateca.
â€œPero lo mejor estÃ¡ por venirâ€, afirmaba Sarasola al comentar las novedades que la marca prepara para un futuro muy prÃ³ximo. Porque durante el prÃ³ximo otoÃ±o se presentarÃ¡ el Terramar, el que serÃ¡ el lanzamiento mÃ¡s importante del aÃ±o y un modelo con el que la marca competirÃ¡ por el triunfo en el premio al Mejor Coche del AÃ±o en EspaÃ±a. Asimismo, Cupra serÃ¡ el automÃ³vil que utilizarÃ¡n todos los participantes en la prestigiosa competiciÃ³n de la Copa AmÃ©rica de vela que se disputarÃ¡ en aguas de la costa de Barcelona.

author: UK News
title: PM congratulates young Paras for serving the country at a â€˜dangerous timeâ€™ | Express & Star
text: PM congratulates young Paras for serving the country at a â€˜dangerous timeâ€™ Rishi Sunak inspected soldiers who have completed initial training at Catterick Garrison, in his North Yorkshire constituency. Prime Minister Rishi Sunak has told young paratroopers â€œyou have stepped forward to serve your country at a dangerous timeâ€, but added: â€œWeâ€™ll have your back throughout.â€ Mr Sunak inspected soldiers from Falklands Platoon, Parachute Regiment, as they passed out after their basic infantry training at Catterick Garrison, in North Yorkshire, on Friday. He told the parade: â€œYou have stepped forward to serve your country at a dangerous time. War has returned to Europe. Threats are rising around the world. â€œSo your service is more meaningful than ever and Iâ€™m determined that the country should serve you as well as I know that youâ€™ll serve us.â€ Mr Sunak said: â€œWeâ€™ll give you the capabilities that you need to fight.â€ He added: â€œWeâ€™ll have your back throughout.â€ The Prime Minister told the young soldiers: â€œYou have done something that few would attempt and fewer still can achieve. â€œYou have put yourself through the toughest test there is anywhere in the world, and you have passed.â€ He said: â€œOn behalf of the whole country, I am here to say congratulations. I have nothing but respect and admiration for each and every one of you.â€ Mr Sunak told the paratroopers and their families, who had gathered for the passing-out parade, that he was proud to have the garrison in his constituency. He recalled how, in 2021, he managed to cross the P Company Trainasium â€“ the famous 60ft high test all paratroopers must complete. â€œItâ€™s perhaps one of the most scary things I have ever done and itâ€™s definitely the most worried that I have ever seen my police protection officers,â€ he told the parade. â€œIâ€™ve had a glimpse, no more than that, but a glimpse of what you have overcome.â€ The Prime Minister inspected the troops, who now move on to jump training, with the regimentâ€™s Colonel Commandant, Lieutenant General Andrew Harrison, who was attending his last parade, after 34 yearsâ€™ service. Mr Sunak told the young paratroopers: â€œYou couldnâ€™t ask for a better archetype of courage and leadership.â€ He also praised Falklands veterans from the Paras, who watched the parade and whom he met before the event. The Prime Minister said: â€œI want to pay sincere tribute to all of them. The nation is in their debt.â€ Mr Sunak presented awards to the top paratroopers in the platoon and was introduced to the regimental mascot â€“ he gave Pegasus V, a Shetland pony, a stroke on the nose. In his speech, Lt Gen Harrison told the Prime Minister: â€œNo-one can under-estimate the unique responsibility that you hold in relation to the lives of these young soldiers. â€œWhen ordered, they will do anything for this country, and we wish you all-possible wisdom and courage in executing that profound duty.â€

author: Jesupemi Are
title: FCT council workers begin strike over minimum wage | TheCable
text:
The federal capital territory (FCT) chapter of the Nigeria Labour Congress (NLC) has directed all workers in the six area councils to commence an indefinite strike from December 1.
Knabanyi Adalo, chairman of the council, gave the directive in a statement on Saturday.
Adalo said the directive was in compliance with a communique issued by the NLC national executive council (NEC) on November 8 in Port Harcourt.
He said NEC appealed to the council chairmen to implement the N70,000 national minimum wage.
Advertisement
Adalo said the chairmen had, however, refused to respond to the demand for implementation of the minimum wage in their respective councils.
â€œThe state administrative council also noted with deep frustration the persistent delay and outright refusal by the area councilsâ€™ chairmen to pay some pending entitlements to the workers, including the outstanding arrears of primary school teachers,â€ he said.
â€œTherefore, all workers in the six area councils in FCT are hereby directed without hesitation to proceed on an indefinite strike beginning from December 1, until further directives.â€
Advertisement
NLC SUSPENDS STRIKE IN SOKOTO
Meanwhile, the Sokoto state chapter of the NLC has suspended its planned strike.
At the presentation of the 2025 budget proposal to the house of assembly, Ahmed Aliyu, Sokoto governor, announced that implementation of the N70,000 minimum wage for workers in the state will begin in January.
During a press briefing, Abdullahi Aliyu, the stateâ€™s NLC chair, said the implementation aligns with the broader goal of fostering development in the state.
Advertisement
â€œThe state branch of the NLC supports the implementation of N70,000 announced by the state government effective January 2025,â€ he said.
â€œWe will also assist the state government in the process of implementing the minimum wage even it means conducting screening and verification to ensure only genuinely employed workers benefit from the new minimum wage of N70,000.â€
Aliyu urged workers to exercise patience, while expressing confidence in the state governmentâ€™s commitment to unveiling more beneficial welfare packages for its workforce.
â€œWe are optimistic that other welfare packages are coming to workers in the state,â€ he said.
Advertisement
Add a comment

author: bvalente
title: Prefeitura de Manaus encaminha 49 trabalhadores para vagas fora do Estado em parceria com a Minerva Foods
text:
Prefeitura de Manaus encaminha 49 trabalhadores para vagas fora do Estado em parceria com a Minerva Foods
09/08/2025 14h21
A Prefeitura de Manaus, por meio da Secretaria Municipal do Trabalho, Empreendedorismo e InovaÃ§Ã£o (Semtepi), e do Sine Manaus, encaminhou 49 trabalhadores para atuarem na empresa Minerva Foods na cidade de Chupinguaia, RondÃ´nia. O embarque foi realizado neste sÃ¡bado, 9/8, na rodoviÃ¡ria de Manaus.
O processo seletivo foi realizado em parceria com a empresa e garantiu vagas para candidatos dispostos a migrar para outros Estados em busca de melhores oportunidades. Para o secretÃ¡rio da Semtepi, Alonso Oliveira, o resultado reforÃ§a o compromisso da gestÃ£o municipal com a geraÃ§Ã£o de emprego e renda.
â€œCada pessoa que embarca hoje leva consigo um sonho e a esperanÃ§a de proporcionar uma vida melhor para sua famÃ­lia. Nosso trabalho Ã© abrir portas, captar oportunidades e trazer empresas parceiras para que o cidadÃ£o tenha a chance de mostrar seu potencial. A parceria com a Minerva Foods mostra que, quando o setor pÃºblico e o privado atuam juntos, conseguimos transformar vidasâ€, afirmou Alonso.
Entre os contratados estÃ¡ Diogo GuimarÃ£es, 22, que vai atuar como operador de empilhadeira. ApÃ³s meses em busca de trabalho na capital, ele viu na proposta uma chance Ãºnica.
â€œÃ‰ a primeira vez que vou trabalhar fora e deixar minha famÃ­lia Ã© difÃ­cil, mas Ã© uma oportunidade Ãºnica. JÃ¡ procurei emprego em vÃ¡rias empresas aqui e nÃ£o consegui. Essa aÃ§Ã£o da prefeitura Ã© muito importante. Meu objetivo Ã© me estabilizar e, quem sabe, trazer minha famÃ­lia para morar comigoâ€, disse.
A mÃ£e de Diogo, a professora Valdenilte GuimarÃ£es, acompanhou o embarque e falou da emoÃ§Ã£o e da confianÃ§a na nova fase do filho.
â€œNunca tÃ­nhamos ficado tanto tempo separados, mas confio que serÃ¡ para o bem dele. Essa Ã© uma oportunidade Ãºnica e digo para outras famÃ­lias: agarrem essas chances que o Sine oferece. Quero agradecer Ã  Prefeitura de Manaus, ao prefeito David Almeida e ao secretÃ¡rio Alonso Oliveira por esse projeto que nos dÃ¡ esperanÃ§a e seguranÃ§aâ€, declarou.
Outro contratado, Gustavo Henrique MagalhÃ£es Cruz, 20, elogiou o atendimento do Sine. â€œO Sine Manaus Ã© uma porta aberta para quem estÃ¡ desempregado. Fui muito bem atendido e consegui a vaga que buscava. Essa oportunidade vai me ajudar financeiramente e como aprendizado para a vida. AgradeÃ§o Ã  prefeitura e Ã  Minerva Foods por acreditarem em nÃ³sâ€, afirmou.
A Prefeitura de Manaus, por meio da Semtepi e do Sine Manaus, mantÃ©m parcerias com empresas de diferentes regiÃµes do paÃ­s para ampliar o acesso da populaÃ§Ã£o a vagas formais. O atendimento Ã© feito nas unidades do Sine, diariamente, onde os candidatos recebem orientaÃ§Ãµes, participam de entrevistas e podem ser encaminhados para vagas compatÃ­veis com seus perfis.
â€” â€” â€”
Texto â€“ Asafe Augusto/Semtepi
Fotos â€“ Ruan Souza/Semtepi

author: Madison McNamee
title: City provides update on Richmond Health Equity Fund
text: City provides update on Richmond Health Equity Fund RICHMOND, Va. (WWBT) -Richmond is investing hundreds of thousands of dollars in new community-led programs to address health disparities in the city. Thursday morning, Mayor Levar Stoney, members of Richmond City Council, and staff with the Richmond Henrico Health Department announced $989,205 in new funding and an additional $388,240 in continued funding for community-based organizations making a difference in health equity. The money is part of the cityâ€™s[ health equity fund](https://www.vdh.virginia.gov/richmond-city/health-equity-fund/), which was established in 2021 using federal dollars. It is a $5 million initiative aimed at providing healthcare resources to low-income communities. â€œToday marks another milestone with the Health Equity Fund, which further shines a light on lasting effects of the American rescue plan,â€ said Dr. Elaine Perry, director of the Richmond Henrico Health Department. Now, the city is expanding the number of organizations that get a portion of the money. â€œThis is locally led. Itâ€™s a dedicated fund, investing in health services and social supports critically needed in our communities,â€ Stoney said. â€The awardees today, past and present, are making a difference, picking up where traditional healthcare organizations leave off, filling in the gaps. Unfortunately, so many of our residents have to navigate the gaps." The organizations selected approach health disparities in many of its forms. The groups address access to healthcare and education resources, chronic disease and underlying health conditions, food access and security, child and maternal health, mental and behavioral health, substance use, prevention and recovery. â€œThese are generational issues, and itâ€™s going to take that kind of investment to really turn it around, and using the ARPA funds in a way, weâ€™re putting Richmond on the map as an innovator and as a city committed to equity,â€ 7th district city councilmember Cynthia Newbille said. [Nationz Foundation](https://nationzfoundationrva.org/) is one of the groups getting some of the money this round. Executive Director Zakia McKensey says it will really improve the impact theyâ€™re making. â€œThis funding is really helping in the community, helping us to provide HIV and STI testing to people in the city of Richmond. It is also helping to have our mobile units out on the street offering food and other services to the community,â€ McKensey said. The additional boost announced on Thursday means she can continue to do that without the financial stress. The health equity fund is now looking for people to join its Community Advisory Committee. The committee could include any community member with professional and/or lived experience with health challenges in Richmond. The CAC selects partner organizations to get the funding. The [CAC application](https://redcap.vdh.virginia.gov/redcap/surveys/?s=RRDPLK7PKKRLFTP9) will remain open until November 26. Individuals, organizations, or collaborators interested in applying for an HEF investment can submit applications in the spring of 2025. Copyright 2024 WWBT. All rights reserved.

author: @finextra
title: CaixaBank introduces carbon footprint verification service for businesses
text:
News and resources on ESG data and technology, Impact Investing and Sustainable Finance initiatives and best practices.
This content has been selected, created and edited by the Finextra editorial team based upon its relevance and interest to our community.
Spain's CaixaBank has launched a service that helps its business clients verify their carbon footprint.
The bank has worked with Aeno - Spain's standardisation and certification body for the industrial and service sectors - on the new service.Firms first need to complete their carbon footprint measurement using CaixaBank's CO2 calculator to identify key sources of direct and indirect Greenhouse Gas (GHG) emissions. Then, they can verify their GHG Protocol Scope 1 and 2 emissions across sectors, including agriculture, waste management, oil and gas, services and industrial. Scope 3 emissions can also be verified on a voluntary basis, encompassing emissions associated with supply chain activities, travel and waste treatmentThe service provides an officially recognised accreditation that can serve as compliance with forthcoming environmental regulations and reporting requirements.
Welcome to Finextra. We use cookies to help us to deliver our services. You may change your preferences at our Cookie Centre.
Please read our Privacy Policy.
